p: Lanostane-type triterpenes such as cycloastragenol, the main phytocompound found in Astragalus membranaceus, were found to have implications in wound healing; in a small clinical study, that investigated the physiological immune response after enteral treatment with Astragalus membranaceus extract, results highlighted the immune stimulation and wound healing promotion by changes induced in specific cytokine populations and platelet count [ 188].
